original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Addhānavagga
analyzed: addhā anavagga

original: 1. Dhammasantatipañha
analyzed: dhammasantatipañha

original: Rājā āha—
analyzed: rājā āha

original: “bhante nāgasena, yo uppajjati, so eva so, udāhu añño”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena yaḥ uppajjati saḥ eva saḥ udāhu aññaḥ ti

original: Thero āha—
analyzed: theraḥ āha

original: “na ca so, na ca añño”ti.
analyzed: na ca saḥ na ca añño ti

original: “Opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: opammam karohi iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, yadā tvaṁ daharo taruṇo mando uttānaseyyako ahosi, soyeva tvaṁ etarahi mahanto”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja yadā tvam daharaḥ taruṇaḥ mandaḥ uttānaseyyakaḥ ahosi tvam etarahi mahantaḥ iti

original: “Na hi, bhante, añño so daharo taruṇo mando uttānaseyyako ahosi, añño ahaṁ etarahi mahanto”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante aññaḥ saḥ daharaḥ taruṇaḥ mandaḥ uttānaseyyakaḥ ahosi aññaḥ aham etarahi mahantaḥ ti

original: “Evaṁ sante kho, mahārāja, mātātipi na bhavissati, pitātipi na bhavissati, ācariyotipi
analyzed: evam sante kho mahā rāja mātā atipi na bhavissati pitā atipi na bhavissati ācariyaḥ atipi

original: na bhavissati, sippavātipi na bhavissati, sīlavātipi na bhavissati, paññavātipi na bhavissati.
analyzed: na bhavissati sippa vāti pi na bhavissati sīla vāti pi na bhavissati pañña vāti pi na bhavissati

original: Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, aññā eva kalalassa mātā, aññā abbudassa mātā, aññā pesiyā mātā,
analyzed: kim nu kho mahā rāja aññā eva kalalassa mātā aññā abbudassa mātā aññā pesiyā mātā

original: aññā ghanassa mātā, aññā khuddakassa mātā, aññā mahantassa mātā, añño sippaṁ sikkhati,
analyzed: aññā ghanassa mātā aññā khuddakassa mātā aññā mahantassa mātā añño sippam sikkhati

original: añño sikkhito bhavati, añño pāpakammaṁ karoti, aññassa hatthapādā chijjantī”ti?
analyzed: aññaḥ sikkhitaḥ bhavati aññaḥ pāpa kammam karoti aññassa hattha pādāḥ chijjanti iti

original: “Na hi, bhante.
analyzed: na hi bhante

original: Tvaṁ pana, bhante, evaṁ vutte, kiṁ vadeyyāsī”ti?
analyzed: tvam pana bhante evam vutte kim vadeyyāsi iti

original: Thero āha—
analyzed: theraḥ āha

original: “ahaññeva kho, mahārāja, daharo ahosiṁ taruṇo mando uttānaseyyako, ahaññeva etarahi mahanto, imameva kāyaṁ nissāya sabbe te ekasaṅgahitā”ti.
analyzed: ahaññā iva kho mahā rāja daharaḥ ahosim taruṇaḥ mandaḥ uttānaseyyakaḥ ahaññā iva etarahi mahantaḥ imam eva kāyam nissāya sabbe te eka saṅgahitā ti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, kocideva puriso padīpaṁ padīpeyya, kiṁ so sabbarattiṁ padīpeyyā”ti?
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja kocid eva purisaḥ padīpam padīpeyya kim saḥ sabbarattim padīpeyya ati

original: “Āma, bhante, sabbarattiṁ padīpeyyā”ti.
analyzed: āma bhante sabbarattim padīpeyya ati

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, yā purime yāme acci, sā majjhime yāme accī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho mahā rāja yā purime yāme sā majjhime yāme iti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Yā majjhime yāme acci, sā pacchime yāme accī”ti?
analyzed: yā majjhime yāme sā pacchime yāme iti

original: “Na hi, bhante”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhantā iti

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, mahārāja, añño so ahosi purime yāme padīpo, añño majjhime yāme padīpo, añño pacchime yāme padīpo”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho mahā rāja aññaḥ saḥ ahosi purime yāme padīpaḥ aññaḥ majjhime yāme padīpaḥ aññaḥ pacchime yāme padīpo ti

original: “Na hi, bhante, taṁyeva nissāya sabbarattiṁ padīpito”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante tayā iva nissāya sabba rattim padīpitaḥ ti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, dhammasantati sandahati, añño uppajjati, añño nirujjhati,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja dhamma santati sandahati aññaḥ uppajjati aññaḥ nirujjhati

original: apubbaṁ acarimaṁ viya sandahati, tena na ca so, na ca añño, purimaviññāṇe pacchimaviññāṇaṁ
analyzed: apubbam acarimam viya sandahati tena na ca saḥ na ca aññaḥ purima viññāṇe pacchima viññāṇa

original: saṅgahaṁ gacchatī”ti.
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchati iti

original: “Bhiyyo opammaṁ karohī”ti.
analyzed: bhiyyas opammam karohi iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, khīraṁ duyhamānaṁ kālantarena dadhi parivatteyya, dadhito navanītaṁ,
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja khīram duyhamānam kāla antarena dadhi dadhitaḥ navanīta

original: navanītato ghataṁ parivatteyya, yo nu kho, mahārāja, evaṁ vadeyya ‘yaṁyeva khīraṁ
analyzed: navanītataḥ yaḥ nu khalu mahā rājaḥ evam vadeyya yayā iva khīra

original: taṁyeva dadhi, yaṁyeva dadhi taṁyeva navanītaṁ, yaṁyeva navanītaṁ taṁyeva ghatan’ti,
analyzed: tayā iva dadhi yayā iva dadhi tayā iva navanīta yayā iva navanītam tayā iva

original: sammā nu kho so, mahārāja, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: sammā nu kho saḥ mahā rāja vadamānaḥ vadeyya ati

original: “Na hi, bhante, taṁyeva nissāya sambhūtan”ti.
analyzed: na hi bhante tayā iva nissāya sambhūtanti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, dhammasantati sandahati, añño uppajjati, añño nirujjhati,
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja dhamma santati sandahati aññaḥ uppajjati aññaḥ nirujjhati

original: apubbaṁ acarimaṁ viya sandahati, tena na ca so, na ca añño, purimaviññāṇe pacchimaviññāṇaṁ
analyzed: apubbam acarimam viya sandahati tena na ca saḥ na ca aññaḥ purima viññāṇe pacchima viññāṇa

original: saṅgahaṁ gacchatī”ti.
analyzed: saṅgaham gacchati iti

original: “Kallosi, bhante nāgasenā”ti.
analyzed: kallosi bhante nāgasena ati

original: Dhammasantatipañho paṭhamo.
analyzed: dhamma santati pañhaḥ paṭhamaḥ
